unlockWallet.forgotPassword: Forgot password? Import with seed phrase

import.enterSeedPhrase: Enter the seed phrase, in the same order saved when creating your wallet.

setup.backupDescription: The seed phrase is the only way to restore your wallet. Write it down, verify it and then store it securely.
setup.confirmSeedInstructions: Tap the 3 words matching their position in the seed phrase. Once confirmed, store the phrase securely.

warning.seedPhraseWarning: Anyone who has this can steal your funds!
warning.viewItInPrivate: View it in private without cameras around.

seedlogin.understandTheRisk: I understand the risk and have privacy
seedlogin.unlockError: Try Again. Enter the right password (it has 8 or more characters).

seedReveal.revealDescription: The seed phrase is the only way to restore your wallet. Write it down, verify it and then store it securely.

settings.title: Default Web3 Wallet
settings.description: Set Liquality as the default dapp wallet. Other wallets cannot interact with dapps while this is enabled.
settings.analyticsSub: Share where you click. No identifying data is collected.
settings.walletLogsSub: The wallet logs contain your public information such as addresses and transactions.
settings.dappConnectionsSub: Forget all of the dapps connected.

experiments.multiaccountsDescription: Allow account management and multiple accounts per network

wallet.nftActivityDescription: Once you start using your NFTs you will see the activity here
wallet.nftDescription: Once you start owning NFTs with accounts in your Liquality wallet you will see them here
wallet.exploreNFT: Explore NFTs on Polygon, Ethereum and Solana
wallet.discoverCollect: Discover and collect NFTs on Arbitrum

details.ledgerInstructions: Follow prompts to verify and accept the amount, then confirm the transaction. There may be a lag

accounts.eyeInstructions: Keep this away from prying eyes!
accounts.exportLedger: Cannot export from a Ledger account
accounts.accountAliasErrorFiveChars: Name should have 5 or more characters
accounts.accountAliasErrorTwentyChars: Name shouldn't have more than 20 characters
accounts.accountAliasErrorExistingAccount: Existing account with the same name or path
accounts.ledgerInstructions1: Plug the Ledger into the computer
accounts.ledgerInstructions3: On the device, navigate to the asset that you want to access
accounts.ledgerInstructions4: To Swap, on your Ledger in the eth App, Go to Settings, then Select 'Blind signing'

accounts.accountMessage2: Eventually close any other apps your ledger is connected to, including Ledger Live.

receive.receiveMessage: Scan this QR code with a mobile wallet to send funds to this address.

enable.theyCanRead: they can read your public account addresses.
